009package Ch15_ColorFilters;
010
011import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
012
013import ij.IJ;
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
019import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LabColorSpace;
021import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LinearRgbColorSpace;
022import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LuvColorSpace;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Rotation2D;
024import imagingbook.common.image.ColorStack;
025import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
026import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
027
028/**
029 * This plugin rotates the input image. This operation
030 * is performed in a color space specified by the user.
031 * The intent is to visualize the differences of linear interpolation
032 * when applied in different color spaces. Bilinear interpolation is 
033 * used to avoid negative component values.
034 * 
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/09/02
037 */
038public class Geometry_Rotate_Color implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        enum ColorStackType {
041                Lab, Luv, LinearRGB, sRGB;
042        }
043        
044        static double angle = 15;                                                       // rotation angle (in degrees)
045        static ColorStackType csType = ColorStackType.sRGB;     // color space to use
046        
047        ImagePlus im = null;
048        
049    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
050        this.im = imp;
051        return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
052    }
053
054    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
055        if (!getParameters()) 
056                return;
057        
058        ColorStack colStack = new ColorStack((ColorProcessor) ip);
059        ColorSpace cs = null;
060        
061        switch (csType) {
062                case Lab :              cs = LabColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
063                        case Luv:               cs = LuvColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
064                        case LinearRGB: cs = LinearRgbColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
065                        case sRGB:              cs = null; break;
066                        default:
067                                IJ.error("Color space " + csType.name() + " not implemented!"); 
068                                return;
069        }
070        
071        if (cs != null) {
072                colStack.convertFromSrgbTo(cs);
073        }
074        
075        Rotation2D imap = new Rotation2D(-2 * Math.PI * angle / 360);   // inverse mapping (target to source)
076        FloatProcessor[] processors = colStack.getProcessors();
077  
078        ImageMapper mapper = new ImageMapper(imap, null, InterpolationMethod.Bilinear);
079                for (FloatProcessor fp : processors) {
080                        //imap.applyTo(fp, InterpolationMethod.Bilinear);
081                        mapper.map(fp);
082                }
083        
084                colStack.convertToSrgb();
085                ColorProcessor cp = colStack.toColorProcessor();
086        String title = im.getShortTitle() + "-rotated-" + csType.name();
087        ImagePlus result = new ImagePlus(title, cp);
088        result.show();
089    }
090    
091    boolean getParameters() {
092                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
093                gd.addEnumChoice("Color space", csType);
094                gd.addNumericField("rotation angle", angle, 0);
095                
096                gd.showDialog();
097                if(gd.wasCanceled())
098                        return false;
099                
100                csType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(ColorStackType.class);
101                angle = gd.getNextNumber();
102                return true;
103    }
104
105}
106
